Eggplant Scanner
CONFIRM NEXT CLEAR
Set Lock Screen Set Pattern Draw An Unlock Pattern Draw Pattern Again To Confirm Release Finger When Done Pattern Recorded Your New Unlock Pattern Connect At Least 4 Dots! Wrong Pattern!
Your New Unlock Pattern Is Created! Okay!
EGGPLANT SCANNER Draw Your Pattern CAPTURE UPLOAD RECAPTURE REUPLOAD Edibility Level: PLACEHOLDER Hi there! Ready to check your eggplant's edibility? Snap a photo or upload one to get instant results! The scanned image shows optimal edibility,
 with no visible signs of spoilage like discoloration,
 texture changes, or decay. The eggplant meets
 the highest standards for freshness and safety,
 making it ideal for consumption. The scanned image shows acceptable edibility,
 with slight imperfections like minor soft spots or
 faint discoloration. The eggplant remains safe to eat
 and retains good quality, making it suitable
 for most culinary preparations. The scanned image shows moderate edibility,
 with visible signs of aging such as dark spots,
 soft patches, or mild shriveling. The eggplant is still
 consumable with caution, but trimming or selective
 use may be necessary. The scanned image shows unsafe edibility,
 with clear signs of spoilage like mold, extensive
 decay, or foul odor. The eggplant poses a health
 risk and does not meet safety standards, so it
 should be discarded immediately. That's not an eggplant.
 Please try again with an image
 of an eggplant. RETURN
